languages.text: A character using a shield has a chance to negate an incoming melee or a ranged attack (but not a psychic power or a Navigator power). This chance is equal to the block parameter of their shield and does not depend on the character's characteristics. When attacked by an enemy, the character will automatically attempt to block, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack. If the character becomes the target of a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst attack{/g}, once they block a shot or a strike, all subsequent shots or strikes in the burst are also blocked.

traits.locale_text: A character using a shield has a chance to negate a melee or a ranged incoming attack (but not a psychic power or a Navigator power). This chance is equal to the block parameter of their shield and does not depend on the character's characteristics. When attacked by an enemy, the character will automatically attempt to block, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack. If the character becomes the target of a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst attack{/g}, once they block a shot or a strike, all subsequent shots or strikes in the burst are also blocked.

This chance is equal to the block parameter of their shield and does not depend on the character's characteristics. When attacked by an enemy, the character will automatically attempt to block, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack. If the character becomes the target of a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst attack{/g}, once they block a shot or a strike, all subsequent shots or strikes in the burst are also blocked.

languages.text: Персонаж, использующий щит, может с определенной вероятностью нейтрализовать атаку в ближнем или дальнем бою (но не психосилу или силу навигатора). Эта вероятность не зависит от характеристик персонажа и равна значению блока — параметра щита. Когда персонажа атакуют, он автоматически пытается применить блок, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g}. Если персонаж становится целью атаки {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g}, то, заблокировав один из выстрелов или ударов, он автоматически блокирует все последующие выстрелы или удары очереди.
languages.original_text: A character using a shield has a chance to negate a melee or a ranged incoming attack (but not a psychic power or a Navigator power). This chance is equal to the block parameter of their shield and does not depend on the character's characteristics. When attacked by an enemy, the character will automatically attempt to block, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack. If the character becomes the target of a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst attack{/g}, once they block a shot or a strike, all subsequent shots or strikes in the burst are also blocked.

Персонаж, использующий щит, может с определенной вероятностью нейтрализовать атаку в ближнем или дальнем бою (но не психосилу или силу навигатора). Эта вероятность не зависит от характеристик персонажа и равна значению блока — параметра щита. languages.text: Un personaje que usa escudo puede anular un ataque a distancia o cuerpo a cuerpo (pero no poderes psíquicos ni de Navegante). La probabilidad de que suceda es igual al parámetro de bloqueo del escudo y no depende de las características del personaje. Cuando un enemigo ataca al personaje, este intentará bloquear, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g} el ataque. Si el personaje es objetivo de un {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ataque de ráfaga{/g}, si bloquea un disparo o golpe bloqueará todos los disparos o golpes subsiguientes de la ráfaga.
languages.original_text: A character using a shield has a chance to negate an incoming melee or a ranged attack (but not a psychic power or a Navigator power). This chance is equal to the block parameter of their shield and does not depend on the character's characteristics. When attacked by an enemy, the character will automatically attempt to block, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack. If the character becomes the target of a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst attack{/g}, once they block a shot or a strike, all subsequent shots or strikes in the burst are also blocked.

traits.locale_text: Un personaje que usa escudo puede anular un ataque a distancia o cuerpo a cuerpo (pero no poderes psíquicos ni de Navegante). La probabilidad de que suceda es igual al parámetro de bloqueo del escudo y no depende de las características del personaje. Cuando un enemigo ataca al personaje, este intentará bloquear, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g} el ataque. Si el personaje es objetivo de un {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ataque de ráfaga{/g}, si bloquea un disparo o golpe bloqueará todos los disparos o golpes subsiguientes de la ráfaga.

languages.text: 使用盾牌的角色有一定几率抵消受到的近战或远程攻击（无法对灵能能力与导航者能力生效）。抵消伤害的几率完全取决于盾牌的“格挡”属性，与角色属性无关。角色在受到敌人攻击时，会自动尝试进行格挡、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。当角色受到{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发攻击{/g}时，只要成功格挡连发攻击中的任意一次射击或打击，此次连发攻击的后续射击或打击也会被自动格挡。
languages.original_text: A character using a shield has a chance to negate an incoming melee or a ranged attack (but not a psychic power or a Navigator power). This chance is equal to the block parameter of their shield and does not depend on the character's characteristics. When attacked by an enemy, the character will automatically attempt to block, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack. If the character becomes the target of a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst attack{/g}, once they block a shot or a strike, all subsequent shots or strikes in the burst are also blocked.

traits.locale_text: 使用盾牌的角色有一定几率抵消受到的近战或远程攻击（无法对灵能能力与导航者能力生效）。抵消伤害的几率完全取决于盾牌的“格挡”属性，与角色属性无关。角色在受到敌人攻击时，会自动尝试进行格挡、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。当角色受到{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发攻击{/g}时，只要成功格挡连发攻击中的任意一次射击或打击，此次连发攻击的后续射击或打击也会被自动格挡。

languages.text: Kalkan kullanan bir karakterin, ister yakın dövüş ister menzilli olsun gelen her türlü (ruhsezi güçleri veya Rotacı güçleri hariç) saldırıyı yadsıma olasılığı bulunur. Bu olasılık, kullanılan kalkanın bloklama parametresine eşittir ve karakterin niteliklerine bağlı değildir. Karakter; bir düşmanın saldırısına uğradığında otomatik olarak bloklama, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} teşebbüsünde bulunur. Karakter, bir {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırının{/g} hedefi olursa bir atışı veya atağı blokladığında o seri saldırıdaki sonradan gelen tüm atış veya ataklar da bloklanır.
languages.original_text: A character using a shield has a chance to negate an incoming melee or a ranged attack (but not a psychic power or a Navigator power). This chance is equal to the block parameter of their shield and does not depend on the character's characteristics. When attacked by an enemy, the character will automatically attempt to block, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack. If the character becomes the target of a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst attack{/g}, once they block a shot or a strike, all subsequent shots or strikes in the burst are also blocked.

traits.locale_text: Kalkan kullanan bir karakterin, ister yakın dövüş ister menzilli olsun gelen her türlü (ruhsezi güçleri veya Rotacı güçleri hariç) saldırıyı yadsıma olasılığı bulunur. Bu olasılık, kullanılan kalkanın bloklama parametresine eşittir ve karakterin niteliklerine bağlı değildir. Karakter; bir düşmanın saldırısına uğradığında otomatik olarak bloklama, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} teşebbüsünde bulunur. Karakter, bir {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırının{/g} hedefi olursa bir atışı veya atağı blokladığında o seri saldırıdaki sonradan gelen tüm atış veya ataklar da bloklanır.

languages.text: Ein Charakter mit einem Schild hat eine Chance, einen Nah- oder Fernkampfangriff aufzuheben (nicht aber psionische oder Navigator-Kräfte). Diese Chance entspricht dem Blocken-Parameter des Schildes und hängt nicht von den Eigenschaften des Charakters ab. Wird der Charakter von einem Gegner attackiert, versucht er automatisch, zu blocken, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g} oder zu {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}. Wenn der Charakter Ziel eines {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenangriffs{/g} wird und einen Schuss oder Hieb blockt, werden alle folgenden Schüsse oder Hiebe automatisch geblockt.
languages.original_text: A character using a shield has a chance to negate an incoming melee or a ranged attack (but not a psychic power or a Navigator power). This chance is equal to the block parameter of their shield and does not depend on the character's characteristics. When attacked by an enemy, the character will automatically attempt to block, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack. If the character becomes the target of a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst attack{/g}, once they block a shot or a strike, all subsequent shots or strikes in the burst are also blocked.

traits.locale_text: Ein Charakter mit einem Schild hat eine Chance, einen Nah- oder Fernkampfangriff aufzuheben (nicht aber psionische oder Navigator-Kräfte). Diese Chance entspricht dem Blocken-Parameter des Schildes und hängt nicht von den Eigenschaften des Charakters ab. Wird der Charakter von einem Gegner attackiert, versucht er automatisch, zu blocken, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g} oder zu {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}. Wenn der Charakter Ziel eines {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenangriffs{/g} wird und einen Schuss oder Hieb blockt, werden alle folgenden Schüsse oder Hiebe automatisch geblockt.

languages.text: キャラクターがシールドを使用している場合、一定の確率で近接攻撃または遠距離攻撃（超能力や航宙士の能力は除く）を無効化する。この確率はシールドのブロック値に等しく、キャラクターの特性には依存しない。敵から攻撃を受けた際、キャラクターは自動的にその攻撃をブロック、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、または{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}しようとする。キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト攻撃{/g}のターゲットになった場合、1発または1撃をブロックすると、そのバースト内の残りのすべての射撃や打撃もブロックされる。
languages.original_text: A character using a shield has a chance to negate an incoming melee or a ranged attack (but not a psychic power or a Navigator power). This chance is equal to the block parameter of their shield and does not depend on the character's characteristics. When attacked by an enemy, the character will automatically attempt to block, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack. If the character becomes the target of a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst attack{/g}, once they block a shot or a strike, all subsequent shots or strikes in the burst are also blocked.

traits.locale_text: キャラクターがシールドを使用している場合、一定の確率で近接攻撃または遠距離攻撃（超能力や航宙士の能力は除く）を無効化する。この確率はシールドのブロック値に等しく、キャラクターの特性には依存しない。敵から攻撃を受けた際、キャラクターは自動的にその攻撃をブロック、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、または{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}しようとする。キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト攻撃{/g}のターゲットになった場合、1発または1撃をブロックすると、そのバースト内の残りのすべての射撃や打撃もブロックされる。

languages.text: Un personnage utilisant un bouclier a une chance d'annuler une attaque ennemie en mêlée ou à distance (à l'exception des pouvoirs psychiques ou de navigateur). Cette chance est égale à la valeur de blocage de son bouclier et ne dépend pas de ses caractéristiques. Lorsque le personnage est attaqué par un ennemi, il tente automatiquement de bloquer, d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} l'attaque. S'il est la cible d'une {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}attaque en rafale{/g} et réussit à bloquer un tir ou un coup, tous les tirs ou coups suivants de la rafale sont également bloqués.
languages.original_text: A character using a shield has a chance to negate an incoming melee or a ranged attack (but not a psychic power or a Navigator power). This chance is equal to the block parameter of their shield and does not depend on the character's characteristics. When attacked by an enemy, the character will automatically attempt to block, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack. If the character becomes the target of a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst attack{/g}, once they block a shot or a strike, all subsequent shots or strikes in the burst are also blocked.

traits.locale_text: Un personnage utilisant un bouclier a une chance d'annuler une attaque ennemie en mêlée ou à distance (à l'exception des pouvoirs psychiques ou de navigateur). Cette chance est égale à la valeur de blocage de son bouclier et ne dépend pas de ses caractéristiques. Lorsque le personnage est attaqué par un ennemi, il tente automatiquement de bloquer, d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} l'attaque. S'il est la cible d'une {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}attaque en rafale{/g} et réussit à bloquer un tir ou un coup, tous les tirs ou coups suivants de la rafale sont également bloqués.
